headline: ComEd Celebrates Rockford’s First Graduating Class of New Market Development Initiative
summary: ROCKFORD, Ill., May 21, 2025--ComEd today graduated nearly a dozen participants of its first Skilled Cohort in Rockford; part of its Market Development Initiative (MDI) that provides resources and training to help create a diverse, local workforce that is qualified to take on roles in the growing energy efficiency industry.
